description: This file contains type definitions, enums, and function prototypes for the Wi-Fi hardware abstraction layer (HAL), specifically deprecated interfaces for Wi-Fi operations. It defines data structures for traffic statistics, neighbor access points, diagnostic settings, associated devices, and radio configurations, along with function prototypes for retrieving and setting Wi-Fi radio parameters, supported features, and radio scanning policies.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioOperationalDataTransmitRates
methods.description: Sets the radio's operational data transmit rates based on the provided list of rates in string format.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioTrafficStatsMeasure
methods.description: Configures traffic statistics measuring rules for the specified radio index using provided measurement settings.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioTrafficStatsRadioStatisticsEnable
methods.description: Enables or disables radio traffic statistics collection for the specified radio index.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioStatsReceivedSignalLevel
methods.description: Retrieves the histogram of received signal levels over a specified interval for a given radio.

methods.name: wifi_getSSIDEnable
methods.description: Gets the configuration parameter indicating whether a specific SSID is enabled.

methods.name: wifi_setSSIDEnable
methods.description: Sets the enable/disable state for a specific SSID.

methods.name: wifi_getSSIDStatus
methods.description: Retrieves the enable status of a specific SSID.

methods.name: wifi_getSSIDName
methods.description: Returns the SSID name associated with a specified access point index.

methods.name: wifi_getSSIDNameStatus
methods.description: Reads the runtime status of the SSID name for a particular access point.

methods.name: wifi_setSSIDName
methods.description: Sets the SSID name for the specified access point.

methods.name: wifi_getBaseBSSID
methods.description: Obtains the BSSID for a specified SSID index.

methods.name: wifi_getSSIDMACAddress
methods.description: Retrieves the MAC address associated with a particular SSID.

methods.name: wifi_getNeighboringWiFiDiagnosticResult2
methods.description: Performs a Wi-Fi scan and returns diagnostic information about neighboring access points.

methods.name: wifi_getNeighboringWiFiStatus
methods.description: Returns the Wi-Fi scan status and neighbor access point info.

methods.name: wifi_getSSIDTrafficStats
methods.description: Deprecated: retrieves traffic statistics for a specific SSID.

methods.name: wifi_getBasicTrafficStats
methods.description: Deprecated: retrieves basic traffic stats for an access point.

methods.name: wifi_getNeighboringWiFiDiagnosticResult
methods.description: Deprecated: performs neighbor Wi-Fi diagnostics; replaced by more recent counterpart.

methods.name: wifi_getAllAssociatedDeviceDetail
methods.description: Deprecated: fetches details of all associated devices for an AP.

methods.name: wifi_getBandSteeringCapability
methods.description: Checks if the platform supports band steering.

methods.name: wifi_getApAssociatedDevice
methods.description: Retrieves list of clients associated with an AP (deprecated).

methods.name: wifi_getApDeviceRSSI
methods.description: Provides the RSSI value of a device connected to an AP.

methods.name: wifi_getApDeviceRxrate
methods.description: Retrieves the receive rate for a device connected to an AP.

methods.name: wifi_getApDeviceTxrate
methods.description: Retrieves the transmit rate for a device connected to an AP.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioTxChainMask
methods.description: Gets the number of transmit streams per radio.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioTxChainMask
methods.description: Sets the number of transmit streams for a specific radio.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioRxChainMask
methods.description: Gets the number of receive streams for a radio.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioRxChainMask
methods.description: Sets the number of receive streams for a specific radio.

methods.name: wifi_pushRadioChannel
methods.description: Deprecated: pushes radio channel setting to hardware.

methods.name: wifi_pushRadioChannel2
methods.description: Deprecated: pushes radio channel setting to hardware version 2.

methods.name: wifi_pushSSID
methods.description: Pushes environment SSID variable to hardware.

methods.name: wifi_pushSsidAdvertisementEnable
methods.description: Pushes SSID advertisement enable setting to hardware.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioReverseDirectionGrantEnable
methods.description: Retrieves whether reverse direction grant is enabled on a radio.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioReverseDirectionGrantEnable
methods.description: Sets reverse direction grant enable on a radio.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioDeclineBARequestEnable
methods.description: Checks if ADDBA (Block Acknowledgement) is accepted on a radio.

methods.name: wifi_setRadioDeclineBARequestEnable
methods.description: Configures ADDBA support on a radio.

methods.name: wifi_getRadio11nGreenfieldSupported
methods.description: Checks if 11n pure mode is supported.

methods.name: wifi_getRadio11nGreenfieldEnable
methods.description: Checks if 11n pure mode is enabled.

methods.name: wifi_setRadio11nGreenfieldEnable
methods.description: Enables/disables 11n pure mode.

methods.name: wifi_createAp
methods.description: Creates a new access point and configures hardware accordingly.

methods.name: wifi_getApIndexFromName
methods.description: Returns access point index for a given SSID string.

methods.name: wifi_setApDTIMInterval
methods.description: Sets the DTIM interval for an access point.

methods.name: wifi_getApBeaconType
methods.description: Gets the beacon type string for an AP.

methods.name: wifi_setApBeaconType
methods.description: Sets the beacon type for an AP.

methods.name: wifi_setApBeaconInterval
methods.description: Sets beacon interval on hardware for an AP.

methods.name: wifi_getApRtsThresholdSupported
methods.description: Checks if RTS threshold is supported.

methods.name: wifi_getApWpaEncryptionMode
methods.description: Gets WPA encryption mode as string.

methods.name: wifi_setApWpaEncryptionMode
methods.description: Sets WPA encryption mode.

methods.name: wifi_setApAuthMode
methods.description: Sets authorization mode on the AP.

methods.name: wifi_setApBasicAuthenticationMode
methods.description: Configures the authentication mode environment variable.

methods.name: wifi_kickApAssociatedDevice
methods.description: Manually disconnects a client device from the AP.

methods.name: wifi_setApRadioIndex
methods.description: Assigns a radio index to an access point.

methods.name: wifi_getApAclDevices
methods.description: Retrieves ACL MAC address list for an AP.

methods.name: wifi_addApAclDevice
methods.description: Adds a MAC address to the AP's ACL list.

methods.name: wifi_delApAclDevice
methods.description: Removes a MAC address from the AP's ACL list.

methods.name: wifi_setApVlanEnable
methods.description: Enables VLAN mode on AP, adding VLAN tags to upstream packets.

methods.name: wifi_getApBridgeInfo
methods.description: Retrieves bridge name, IP address, and subnet for an AP.

methods.name: wifi_setApBridgeInfo
methods.description: Sets bridge configuration for an AP.

methods.name: wifi_pushBridgeInfo
methods.description: Pushes bridge info environment variables to hardware.

methods.name: wifi_pushApEnable
methods.description: Enables or disables an AP.

methods.name: wifi_pushApSsidAdvertisementEnable
methods.description: Pushes SSID advertisement state to hardware.

methods.name: wifi_getApWMMCapability
methods.description: Checks WMM support for an AP.

methods.name: wifi_getApUAPSDCapability
methods.description: Checks U-APSD support for an AP.

methods.name: wifi_getApSecurityModesSupported
methods.description: Returns supported security modes for an AP.

methods.name: wifi_getApSecurityModeEnabled
methods.description: Gets current security mode of an AP.

methods.name: wifi_setApSecurityModeEnabled
methods.description: Enables specified security mode on an AP.

methods.name: wifi_getApSecurityPreSharedKey
methods.description: Fetches the PSK for an AP.

methods.name: wifi_setApSecurityPreSharedKey
methods.description: Sets the PSK for an AP.

methods.name: wifi_getApSecurityKeyPassphrase
methods.description: Gets the passphrase used for WPA/WPA2.

methods.name: wifi_setApSecurityKeyPassphrase
methods.description: Sets the passphrase for WPA/WPA2.

methods.name: wifi_getApWpsEnable
methods.description: Queries WPS enable state for an AP.

methods.name: wifi_setApWpsEnable
methods.description: Enables or disables WPS for an AP.

methods.name: wifi_getApWpsConfigMethodsSupported
methods.description: Indicates what WPS config methods are supported.

methods.name: wifi_getApWpsConfigMethodsEnabled
methods.description: Returns which WPS config methods are enabled.

methods.name: wifi_setApWpsConfigMethodsEnabled
methods.description: Sets WPS config methods on an AP.

methods.name: wifi_getApWpsDevicePIN
methods.description: Returns the WPS device PIN.

methods.name: wifi_setApWpsDevicePIN
methods.description: Sets the WPS device PIN.

methods.name: wifi_getApAssociatedDeviceDiagnosticResult
methods.description: Lists associated devices with diagnostics information.

methods.name: wifi_getApAssociatedDeviceDiagnosticResult2
methods.description: Lists associated devices with extended diagnostics.

methods.name: wifi_getApInterworkingServiceCapability
methods.description: Checks if the AP supports Interworking Service.

methods.name: wifi_setBTMRequest
methods.description: Sends a BSS Transition Management request to a non-AP station.

methods.name: wifi_getBSSTransitionImplemented
methods.description: Checks if BTM transition is implemented.

methods.name: wifi_getBTMClientCapabilityList
methods.description: Retrieves BTM capabilities of external stations.

methods.name: wifi_setNeighborReports
methods.description: Sets neighbor report information for an AP.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioChannels
methods.description: Returns a map of current channel states for given radio.

methods.name: wifi_dppSetSTAPassphrase
methods.description: Sets a passphrase for DPP configuration.

methods.name: wifi_dppRemoveSTAPassphrase
methods.description: Removes a DPP passphrase.

methods.name: wifi_apAuthEvent_callback_register
methods.description: Registers callback for access point authentication events.

methods.name: wifi_apAuthenticatedEvent_callback_register
methods.description: Registers callback for authenticated device events.

methods.name: wifi_apAssociatedDevice_callback_register
methods.description: Registers callback for device association events.

methods.name: wifi_getRadioClientInactivityTimout
methods.description: Reads the client inactivity timeout value for a radio.

methods.name: wifi_getApInterworkingServiceCapability
methods.description: Determines if the AP supports interworking.

methods.name: wifi_steering_supported
methods.description: Indicates support for steering API.

methods.name: wifi_steering_setGroup
methods.description: Sets a steering group with specific AP configurations.

methods.name: wifi_getApAuthenticatedDevices
methods.description: Retrieves list of authenticated devices for an AP.

methods.name: wifi_getBSSTransitionImplemented
methods.description: Checks if the BSS transition is supported/implemented.

methods.name: wifi_dppInitiate
methods.description: Starts a DPP session by initiating the provisioning process with a peer device, using specified context data, on a given channel.

methods.name: wifi_dppCancel
methods.description: Cancels an ongoing DPP session if no response has been received yet.

methods.name: wifi_dpp_frame_received_callbacks_register
methods.description: Registers callback functions for handling DPP authentication responses, configuration requests, results, reconfig announcements, and reconfig authentication responses.

methods.name: wifi_dppSendAuthCnf
methods.description: Sends a DPP authentication confirmation message to a peer device, typically after successful DPP authentication.

methods.name: wifi_dppSendConfigResponse
methods.description: Sends a device-specific DPP configuration response to a peer device.

methods.name: mgmt_frame_received_callback
methods.description: Callback invoked when a management frame is received, providing context such as which AP, MAC address, frame data, frame type, and direction.

methods.name: wifi_anqp_request_callback_register
methods.description: Registers a callback to handle ANQP element requests from associated stations.

methods.name: wifi_anqpSendResponse
methods.description: Sends an ANQP response containing a list of elements to a station.

methods.name: wifi_chan_eventRegister
methods.description: Registers a callback to be invoked on radio channel events such as changes in channel states.

methods.name: wifi_isZeroDFSSupported
methods.description: Checks if Zero DFS (Background CAC) is supported on a specified radio index.
